availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: H. L. Jones (McCracken County, KY, prov govt conv member, attorney)

body.p: McCracken County, Kentucky, attorney and member of the provisional government. Kentucky native. Son of H. L. Jones. Attorney in Paduach in 1860. Household owned ten enslaved persons in Paducah in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, District 1, p. 142.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, p. 928.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah District 1, p. 418A.
KYR-0004-033-0001.
